name: Meet'N'Fuck Kingdom
summary: We're going to the Middle Ages. There we meet our hero Murton. In Lavindor Kingdom he's known as the best healer. Today he's got a mission of great importance! Man's power of the King has gone out unexpectly in recent days. And you should make a special love potion which can bring back his potency. As a reward you'll get as much gold as you can carry.
